description: Amendments to planning permission dated 30 September 2019 (RN: 19/04631/FULL) for variation of condition 1 (approved plans) and 9 of planning permission dated 21 November 2017 (RN: 17/07627/FULL) for the: Demolition of existing building and redevelopment to provide a new building comprising lower ground floor, mezzanine, upper ground floor and first to eight floor levels for use as hotel (Class C1) with ancillary Bar/Restaurant, external landscaping and associated works, to allow maintenance access to the terrace; an additional two metres of excavation at basement level, the extension at basement and ground floor level out to the rear boundary with the alms house, increased plant screen height by 0.6 metres, the introduction of a maintenance doors to the front and rear at the 8th floor, the removal of coloured window reveals, alterations to the rear lightwell, removal of skylight and bench to the front forecourt, the addition of two security bollards at front boundary of the site. Namely, to vary the approved energy strategy from Combined Heat and Power to Air Source Heat Pumps.
